channel.title: Wpscan on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Wpscan on TLDRBins

item.title: Wordpress
item.description: Default config location /var/www/html/wp-config.php Tools wpscan # HTTP wpscan --url <TARGET> -e ap,t,tt,u # HTTPS wpscan --url <TARGET> -e ap,t,tt,u --disable-tls-checks # You will need an api token to scan vulns wpscan --url <TARGET> -e ap,t,tt,u --api-token <API_KEY> # Brute force wp-admin wpscan --url <TARGET> --passwords passwords.txt --usernames admin Ref: Get Free API key
